item.description:
Bristol County Games will be hosting a Roleplay game night at Still Point Comics 120 S. Main St.
Fall River, MA 02721 on the last Tuesday of every month. The game will be set in the modern setting of a fictional city. The setting backdrop will be old style World Of Darkness. Players will be Roleplaying a new addition to the old W.O.D. factions in a Storyline and plot driven game focused on Roleplaying in a political, social and investigative Chronical.
Bristol County Games welcomes everyone to come out and have some fun at our FREE game nights. For more information feel free to contact us at fallrivergamers@yahoo.com
item.name: Roleplay at StillPoint Fall River
